channel.title: [PZ] Project Zeta ~ Final Version
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][b]Project Zeta V2; Final Version[/b][/size] [b][i]by RandQm[/i][/b][/center]
[size=14pt][b]Introduction:[/b][/size] My last release contained many bugs, it didn't have a magic system, buggy combat. Not that that bothers me, I'm not here to provide you a server to host. Anyways I improved already so much more, and I decided to release a "final" version. This contains all the content needed to get started.
[size=14pt][b]New in this release[/b][/size]
[ul][li]scratch written new magic system (all normal and ancients spells are fully working including all effects!)[/li] [li]Brand new combat system both PVP & PVN[/li] [list] [li]Max hit & accuracy formulas, melee max hit formula is 99% accurate.[/li] [li]New special attack handling (contains all 317 weapons with the RIGHT special attack effects)[/li] [li]special bar loads every 5% instead of the well known 25[/li] [li]New poison handling[/li] [/list] [li]New nutrition handling[/li] [list] [li]Almost all foods eatable, including kebab with effects[/li] [li]Every single potion, almost all with their right effects[/li] [/list] [li]100% mithril seeds (includes rarity of flowers, moving tile, sending pick or leave message, visible for all players, ect... everything)[/li] [li]XML system is added, used for item requirements now.[/li] [li]Skillguides[/li] [li]New prayer handling (all prayers work perfectly, draining goes by the right rates)[/li] [li]Most world doors & double doors working (credits to kilasmee)[/li] [li]Clipped following (credits to asshole_rule)[/li] [li]and some smaller work..[/li] [li]and almost everything from the first release: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556152.msg4071284.html#msg4071284[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt][b]Media[/b][/size]
Combat video: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A3Jsd9FtsSo&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
Piczzz:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ag68r.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VVFBH.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P3ORE.png[/img]
[size=14pt][b]Links[/b][/size] Most clients should work, else look on my first release. Source Download: http://uppit.com/s6frvuzbs6ai/Project_Zeta_final_version.rar
[size=14pt][b]Credits[/b][/size] Me arham lostmyphat team_rocket

item.description:
@Ian1045 wrote:

[quote=“relentlesspk, post:46, topic:456329”][quote author=Ian1045 link=topic=559267.msg4127849#msg4127849 date=1350688666]
Can you please fix the download link man? I want to try this
[/quote]

[quote author=enzo42 link=topic=559267.msg4099099#msg4099099 date=1347226668]
Combat is very laggy/buggy (if you attack an enemy it takes like 5 seconds before it starts attacking)
and it has some other bugs (if player does the block animation, you randomly have a rubber chicken in your hand)

But since it’s completely rewritten from scratch, it always can have some bugs.

And…

Mirror: http://up.ht/TFOXZK

edit: just found out i tested it on the first version, and it isn’t that buggy in this version(last one), but ranged is very buggy tho.
[/quote][/quote]

Thanks man You’re the best <3

Read full topic

item.title: [PZ] Project Zeta ~ Final Version
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

VideoEditorMilo:

This looks really neat. Someone told me that Delta is a good base to start off with as a beginner so, is this more complex than Delta and would you reccomend it to a beginner?

I kept the simplicity of delta as much as possible, and all systems I wrote are designed to be easy to add content to.
Also there are a lot of information blocks, so yes this should be good for a starter, as long as you want to learn and not just copy and paste tutorials

Read full topic
